metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0105-1 -- Recommended update for crash
metadata.description:
This collective update for crash provides the following fixes:
* Fix a bug that could cause removal of the booted kernel's vmlinux image. (bnc#828260) * Display tasks on a priority array of a CPU's RT runqueue. (bnc#826507) * Display the RT runqueue when using CFS scheduler. (bnc#826507) * Fix RT not support group sched bug. (bnc#826507) * Fix segmentation fault when trying to analyze vmcore of hypervisor panic. (bnc#835850) * Add many improvements and fixes for handling Xen vmcores. (bnc#835850)

extend_definition.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11.x is installed
